pages.text: $(li)The Heart of Diamond is a item that can be used to craft a $(l:patchouli:tools/quark/pickarang)Pickarang$(/l) in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l).$(br)$(li)It can be used to summon tamed $(l:patchouli:pets/quark/stoneling)Stonelings$(/l) too.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:pets/quark/stoneling)Stoneling$(/l) may drop this item on death.
